ModMetaData.name: RimAI Core (BETA)
ModMetaData.author: Kilokio
ModMetaData.description:
Talk to an AI "Server/Terminal" that sees your base, jokes with other servers, and helps you run the colony. Player-focused, playable content (BETA).
Gameplay highlights: • Environment-aware conversations: advice based on live context (weather, power, stocks, mood/health, threats) • Distinct servers to explore: different personalities, banter, and hidden gags • Ask for precise colony state: straight answers from your live data • Call powerful server tools: intel scans, logistics tallies, security tips, production nudges (with cooldowns/requirements) • Personas, worldview, backstories, roles: feels like a staff team, not a toolbar • Spontaneous group chats and server banter: listen in or chime in for useful intel • (In development) AI-driven pawn behavior: more "alive" day-to-day decisions • Multilingual LLM support (Chinese, English, etc.)
Requirements & load order: • Harmony • RimAI Framework Load order: Harmony → RimAI Framework → RimAI Core
